title: Fear Is a Thief
verse_text: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.
insight: Fear steals peace, confidence, and destiny.
Fear takes. Faith gives. Choose your source.
one_minute_win: Say aloud: “Fear doesn’t own me. God does.”
declaration: I live in power, love, and self-control - not fear.
related_devotionals: Joshua 1:9 Devotional - Be Strong and Courageous
